p:testcaseDefinition.p:name: EID_SERVER_A2_02_RSA
p:testcaseDefinition.p:description: This test case checks the behaviour of the eID-Server in case the eService uses an invalid XML signature during communication over the eID-Interface.
p:testcaseDefinition.p:clientExplanation: Configure the server to accept the certificate chain for client E. This includes the TLS, XML signature and the CV certificate.
